Sentence.string: Good morning my lady, I’m investigating on Marcus Blayton’s death. I’m sorry to disturb you but I have some questions to ask you… Did you personally know Marcus Blayton ?

My husband and I had many lunches with Marcus and his wife. We were at their home yesterday, for lunch… that’s really strange because he seemed in great shape. I don’t believe he killed himself M. White, do you ?
That’s what I’m trying to find out.
